buildings.name: Apothecary
buildings.description: Brew potions from herbs and secondary ingredients. Herbalists create healing and combat potions.

tiers.flavorText: Healing herbs soothe wounds when struck.
Immaculate herbs restore vitality when hit.
Transcendent herbs grant miraculous recovery when struck.
Immaculate healing mist revitalizes the party.
Transcendent mist dramatically heals all allies.
Transcendent fortune showers you with wealth.
Cleanses ailments when health is critical.
Refined antidote triggers at higher health.
